name: RUIN ESCAPE (Reccy)
description:
Escape from a crumbling ruin, by ruining it even more!

Shoot at the walls to knock them down, but be careful!

The floor around destroyed walls will become unstable, so you'd better not stand around too much...

This is a short game I made in about 10ish hours. There's 4 levels overall, although the final one is quite hard.

I hope you enjoy!

Controls (Keyboard):

W S A D - Move

I J K L - Shoot

Enter - Start Game / Restart Level (When dead)

Controls (XBOX):

Left Stick / D PAD - Move

A B X Y - Shoot

A - Start Game / Restart Level (When dead)
